archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Guide Resource Usage Records
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Relates the usage record to the appropriate service. Extended Description The Guide Resource Usage Records process converts/relates the record to the appropriate service.
In many cases, this process is performed by a resource such as a network element. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use. Optional Reserved for future use.
